swen221.lab2.model

接口 Rule

  • 所有已知实现类:
    CellDecayAbstractRule, CellDecayOverPopulationRule, CellDecayReproductionRule, CellDecayUnderPopulationRule, ConwayAbstractRule, ConwaysOverpopulationRule, ConwaysReproductionRule, ConwaysUnderpopulationRule

    public interface Rule
    Provides a concept of a rule for controlling cell creation / destruction in the simulation.
    作者:
    David J. Pearce

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int NOT_APPLICABLE
      A constant for capturing the case when a rule does not apply.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int apply(int x, int y, BoardView view)
      Apply a given rule to a board to determine the cell's current state.

    • 字段详细资料

      • NOT_APPLICABLE

        static final int NOT_APPLICABLE
        A constant for capturing the case when a rule does not apply.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • apply

        int apply(int x,
          int y,
          BoardView view)
        Apply a given rule to a board to determine the cell's current state.
        参数:
        x - The horizontal position of the cell on the board whose state we are calculating
        y - The vertical position of the cell on the board whose state we are calculating
        view - The current state of the board
        返回:
        The new state of the cell, or -1 if this rule could not apply.
